ticket.title: Can I get a command-line option to turn off ansi sequences in the output
ticket.original-body:
I run the output of `rails [new] project` through a filter, and it's confused by the output from Rails 3.
I see I can add
config.colorize_logging = false
to config/application.rb to turn off the sequences for other rails commands, but I'm looking for a way to do this before the config/application.rb file has been created.
